title: Scarcity forces us to make choices

content.question: Individuals in any society must make choices regarding the types of goods and services to be produced because

choices.label: free markets do not always allocate resources efficiently
free markets only satisfy the demands of paying consumers
opportunity costs increase as more of a good or service is produced
resources are scarce and human wants are unlimited
resources must be allocated for the benefit of the entire society

content.answer: resources are scarce and human wants are unlimited
